author: alexb5dh
content:
Just noticed that Geth eth/69 PR changes how tx-type is serialized - `WriteByte` was used before, but now it's `WriteUint64`:
https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/29158/files#diff-c74fb8525827c317c4051289be8a1c5e9e14e42124fec4833eb7665793e303d9R161
Is this intended? If yes, probably should be mentioned in the EIP, as `0` (legacy type) will now be serialized as `0x80`.
